forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder is possible early. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder is possible early. Low 46F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then windy late with skies turning partly cloudy. High 11C. WSW winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies and gusty winds late. High 52F. WSW winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 6C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. NW winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 57F. NW winds at less than 5 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High near 15C. NW winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. Becoming windy late. High around 60F. NW winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 9C. NNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. NW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
